name: SNAudioStreamAnalyzer
desc: An object you create to analyze a stream of audio data and provide the results to your app.

items.name: init(format: AVAudioFormat)
items.desc: Creates a new audio stream analyzer.

items.name: func add(SNRequest, withObserver: SNResultsObserving)
items.desc: Adds a new analysis request to the audio stream analyzer.

items.name: protocol SNRequest
items.desc: A protocol that represents sound analysis requests.

items.name: protocol SNResultsObserving
items.desc: The interface your app implements to receive the results of an analysis request.

items.name: func remove(SNRequest)
items.desc: Removes an existing request from the audio stream analyzer.

items.name: func removeAllRequests()
items.desc: Removes all the sound analysis requests from the audio stream analyzer.

items.name: func analyze(AVAudioBuffer, atAudioFramePosition: AVAudioFramePosition)
items.desc: Adds a new audio buffer to the analyzerâ€™s larger stream buffer.

items.name: func completeAnalysis()
items.desc: Notifies the analyzer when it receives the final audio buffer.
